title: Shenandoah National Park: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park                   Discover how the CCC helped build this park.               Explore the many bird species of Shenandoah.               Learn about the endangered Shenandoah...               Browse through our educational offerings.         Â    Looking for more information?   News Browse news releases;follow us on Facebook or Twitter to find out news as it is happening in the park. Photos & Multimedia Explore photo galleries, watch ranger podcasts, or see the park in real time with our webcams. History People have lived in what is now Shenandoah National Park for many years. Read the stories or hardship, sacrifice, and triumph to better understand why Shenandoah is so special. Nature The southern Appalachians support a vast diversity of unique and fragile ecosystems. Discover the plants, animals, and environmental factors that make Shenandoah so diverse. Science & Research Dig into the latest findings of scientific studies being conducted in the park, and learn how you can get a permit do research here too! Education Parks are amazing classrooms. Whether you are looking to plan a curriculum based field trip, a self guided adventure, or a long distance learning opportunity we have the information you need. Kids Are you interested in becoming a Junior Ranger or a Ranger Explorer? We have the information and downloadable books you are looking for! Downloadable Guides This is where you can download the latest Shenandoah Explorer Visitor Guide. Management Want to learn about who we are? What our guiding principles are? Here you will find out what our laws and policies are, the latest park statistics, as well as information about our partners and much more.
